de.geofencing.event.notification

Class FirebaseServerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.event.notification.FirebaseServerClient

  • public class FirebaseServerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to send an notification via Firebase Messaging Service. Therefore an HTTP post is send to the Firebase service.
    Author:
    Markus Thral
